mapper.select: select article.*, `member`.nickname, `board`.boardName from article left join `member` on article.uid = `member`.uid left join board on article.boardCode = board.boardCode AND article.articleType = board.boardType where 1 and blindStatus = 0 and article.delStatus = 0 and articleType = #{articleType} and article.uid = #{uid}

select article.*, `member`.nickname, `board`.boardName from article left join `member` on article.uid = `member`.uid left join board on article.boardCode = board.boardCode AND article.articleType = board.boardType where 1 and blindStatus = 0 and article.delStatus = 0 and articleType = #{articleType} order by aid desc limit 10

select article.*, `member`.nickname, `board`.boardName, auth.authName from article left join `member` on article.uid = `member`.uid left join board on article.boardCode = board.boardCode AND article.articleType = board.boardType left join auth on `member`.authLevel = auth.authLevel where aid = #{aid}
select count(*) from article where articleType = #{articleType} and blindStatus = 0 and article.delStatus = 0
mapper.insert: insert into article set title = #{title}, body = #{body}, uid = #{uid}, boardCode = #{boardCode}, articleType = #{articleType}
mapper.update: update article set title = #{title}, body = #{body}, boardCode = #{boardCode} where aid = #{aid}
update article set delStatus = 1, delDate = now() where aid = #{aid};
update article set hit = hit + 1 where aid = #{aid}
